name: Loose bolts
description: A pile of rusty parts found from the crushed remains of robots. Most noticeably, a pair of rusted springlocks are in the midst of the devastation.

name: Functioning Limb
description: While the animatronic is torn beyond recognition, some part of it is still salvageable.

name: Metal Pipe
description: A ventilation pipe. It's stained with blood.

name: Hatchet
description: The hatchet brings you an unsettling feeling

name: Battery
description: A battery found from a camera. It still functions with the remaining power left in it.

name: Freddy Figurine
description: It brings you nostalgia. The microphone in the toy's hands is gone.
effect: If the selected character is Freddy, increase damage by 5. Else, it's a pretty cool figurine isn't it.

name: Bonnie Figurine
description: It brings you nostalgia. The guitar in the toy's hands is gone.
effect: If the selected character is Bonnie, increase damage by 5. Else, it's a pretty cool figurine isn't it.

name: Chica Figurine
description: It brings you nostalgia. You notice that the beak of the figurine is missing.
effect: If the selected character is Chica, increase damage by 5. Else, it's a pretty cool figurine isn't it.

name: Foxy Figurine
description: It brings you nostalgia. The hook in the toy's hands is gone.
effect: If the selected character is Foxy, increase damage by 5. Else, it's a pretty cool figurine isn't it.
